LANGUAGE.LABEL: Oops! The selected function is not currently available.
CALCULATE STARTUP BONUSES: Click the "Process" button below to create startup bonuses for all new member payments in the specified date range below.
CALCULATE MONTHLY BONUSES: Click the "Process" button below to create monthly bonuses for all monthly member payments in the specified date range below.
CREATE PAYOUTS: Click the "Process" button below to create payouts for all unpaid bonuses up to the date specified below and totaling $30+ per member.
MARK PENDING PAYOUTS PAID: Click the "Process" button below to update the status of all pending payouts to paid, up to the date specified below.
CALCULATE REFERRALS: Click the "Process" button below to calculate all member's personal and team referrals.
CALCULATE ADVANCEMENT: Click the "Process" button below to calculate advancements. Confirm that the referrals are current with the "Calculate Referrals" process.
POST MONTHLY REFERRALS: Click the "Process" button below to post all member's currrent personal and team referrals with the date specified below.
CALCULATE QUALIFIED MEMBERS: Click the "Process" button below to calculate all active members that are qualified to earn bonuses or that are "Qualify" locked after the date specified below.

EXPORT PENDING PAYOUTS: Click the "Process" button below to create payout files stored in the "Payouts" folder, for ACH transactions and paper check printing. Pending payouts will be processed up to the date specified below and totaling $30+ per member.

CREAT PAYMENT CREDITS: Click the "Process" button below to create payment credits for all members with bill dates due within the next 30 days that have sufficient earned commissions that have not been paid yet.
DECLINED PAYMENTS: Click the "Process" button below to view a list of members with declined payments.
INTRODUCTORY OFFER UPGRADES: Click the "Process" button below to automatically upgrade all Introductory members that have the earnings to pay for the upgrade and have Process=0.
CALCULATE QUALIFIED BONUS CHECKS: Click the "Process" button below to calculate all active members that are qualified to receive a bonus check.
NEW CONSULTANT MAILING LIST: Click the "Process" button below to view a list of new consultants with mailing addresses to receive their initial information mailing.
NEW CONSULTANT MARK IN PROCESS: Click the "Process" button below to mark all new consultants with mailing addresses "In Process" to receive their initial information mailing.
NEW CONSULTANT MARK MAILED: Click the "Process" button below to mark all "In Process" New Consultant mailings as "Mailing Complete".
